recipes.name: CHOCOLATE VELVET CHEESECAKE
ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese, softened
recipes.prep: Combine crumbs, nuts, 3 tablespoons granulated sugar and margarine. Press onto bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan. Bake at 325째 for 10 minutes. Combine cream cheese and brown sugar, mixing at medium speed with electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each. Blend in chocolate, milk, and vanilla extract; pour over crust. Bake at 325째 for 35 minutes. Combine sour cream and 2 tablespoons granulated sugar; carefully spread over cheesecake. Bake at 425째 for 10 minutes. Loosen cake from rim of pan. Cool before removing rim of pan. Chill. Garnish with mint candies.

recipes.name: CHOCOLATE BROWNIE PIE
recipes.prep: Melt baking chocolate and let stand to cool. Beat eggs until very light. Cream butter. Gradually add sugar to the butter, beating until light and fluffy. Sift flour and salt together; set aside. Add the cooled chocolate and the eggs to the creamed mixture. Mix well. Alternately add flour mixture and milk (to which the vanilla has been added). Stir in nuts. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Bake at 375째 for 45 to 50 minutes. Serve with ice cream, if desired.
